statements.insert: insert hotels( HotelCode, Name, Level, Address, Contact, Description, OpeningDate, LastDecorationDate, RoomCount, HighestFloor, Fax, NameEn, Park, Network ) values ( #HotelCode#, #Name#, #Level#, #Address#, #Contact#, #Description#, #OpeningDate#, #LastDecorationDate#, #RoomCount#, #HighestFloor#, #Fax#, #NameEn#, #Park#, #Network# ) SELECT @@IDENTITY AS Id
